message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $18,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. I am still unable to pay more than $12,000 for the product. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need to get a fair price for this product. $13,500 is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise. I am still only able to offer $12,000 for the product. I hope this helps us move forward towards a resolution.
